channel.title: Pages on Nino's Pixel Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Nino's Pixel Blog

item.title: About
item.description:
This is a site to record my learning about computer graphics / rendering / game programming, etc.

There are two main categories of articles: notes and posts.
Notes are for writing downâ€”concepts, formulas, etc, all sorts of important things from books / papers / cources / online articles / source code.
Posts are for my own thinking and/or implementation of a certain rendering algorithm / technique.
